title: An Englishman's horse
creator_credit: David Cammell, Jean Wadlow and Charles Barker Films
brief_description: The ancient partnership of man with horse is celebrated in this film. Two horse trials are featured showing something of just how tough a horse trial can be. Originally a form of cavalry training, it is the ultimate test of horse and rider.
creator_credit_for_label: David Cammell, Jean Wadlow and Charles Barker Films
